Easy GraphQL server implementation with Nuxt
This package allows you to easily develop a GraphQL server in your
For consuming a GraphQL API on the client-side, we recommend the modules
from where you can import your schema. Under the hood, it automatically merges multiple schema files together into a complete schema. Moreover, you no longer need to worry about deploying schema
Automatically generated typescript definitions for your resolvers via the virtual module
integration: adds the Apollo Studio Sandbox directly in the devtools.

# npm
npm install @apollo/server graphql @as-integrations/h3 nuxt-graphql-server

# yarn
yarn add @apollo/server graphql @as-integrations/h3 nuxt-graphql-server

# pnpm
pnpm add @apollo/server graphql @as-integrations/h3 nuxt-graphql-server
